problem_names:
lemma dg_0_components:
  shows "dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"

lemma (in digraph) dg_dg_0_if_Obj_0:
  assumes "\<CC>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
  shows "\<CC> = dg_0"

lemma dghm_0_components:
  shows "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = dg_0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>"

lemma dg_10_components:
  shows "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"

lemma dg_1_components:
  shows "dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = set {\<ff>}"
    and "dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"
    and "dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = set {\<langle>\<ff>, \<aa>\<rangle>}"

lemma (in \<Z>) digraph_dg_1: 
  assumes "\<aa> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" and "\<ff> \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>" 
  shows "digraph \<alpha> (dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>)"

lemma dg_1_is_arrI:
  assumes "a = \<aa>" and "b = \<aa>" and "f = \<ff>" 
  shows "f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b"

lemma dg_1_is_arrD:
  assumes "f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b"
  shows "a = \<aa>" and "b = \<aa>" and "f = \<ff>"

lemma dg_1_is_arrE:
  assumes "f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b"
  obtains "a = \<aa>" and "b = \<aa>" and "f = \<ff>"
lemma dg_1_is_arr_iff: "f : a \<mapsto>\<^bsub>dg_1 \<aa> \<ff>\<^esub> b \<longleftrightarrow> (a = \<aa> \<and> b = \<aa> \<and> f = \<ff>)"
translations:
lemma dg_0_components:
  shows "dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>

proof (state)
goal (11 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence dg_0
 3. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
 4. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
 5. vcard dg_0 = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 6. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 7. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 8. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 9. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 10. dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
A total of 11 subgoals...

proof (state)
this:
  vfsequence dg_0

goal (10 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
 3. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
 4. vcard dg_0 = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 5. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 6. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 7. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 8. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 9. dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
 10. \<And>A B.
        \<lbrakk>A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>;
         B \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>;
         A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>;
         B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>
                           ((\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A.
                                \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>
                                 (VLambda B (Hom dg_0 a) `\<^sub>\<circ>
                                  B)) `\<^sub>\<circ>
                            A)
                          \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>

proof (state)
this:
  vcard dg_0 = 4\<^sub>\<nat>

goal (9 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
 3. vsv (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
 4. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 5. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 6. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>) = dg_0\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 7. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_0\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 8. dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
 9. \<And>A B.
       \<lbrakk>A \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>;
        B \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>;
        A \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>;
        B \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>
                          ((\<lambda>a\<in>\<^sub>\<circ>A.
                               \<Union>\<^sub>\<circ>
                                (VLambda B (Hom dg_0 a) `\<^sub>\<circ>
                                 B)) `\<^sub>\<circ>
                           A)
                         \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
subsubsection\<open>Arrow with a domain and a codomain\<close>
subsubsection\<open>A digraph without objects is empty\<close>

lemma (in digraph) dg_dg_0_if_Obj_0:
  assumes "\<CC>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = 0"
  shows "\<CC> = dg_0"

by (rule dg_eqI[of \<alpha>])
    (
      auto simp:
        dg_cs_intros
        assms
        digraph_dg_0 
        dg_0_components 
        dg_Arr_vempty_if_Obj_vempty 
        dg_Cod_vempty_if_Arr_vempty 
        dg_Dom_vempty_if_Arr_vempty
    )

lemma dghm_0_components:
  shows "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = dg_0"
    and "dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = dg_0 &&&
    dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ([[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, dg_0,
      \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>[]\<^sub>\<circ>\<rparr> =
     []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
     [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, dg_0,
      \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>1\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
     []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, dg_0,
     \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>2\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    dg_0 &&&
    [[]\<^sub>\<circ>, []\<^sub>\<circ>, dg_0,
     \<AA>]\<^sub>\<circ>\<lparr>3\<^sub>\<nat>\<rparr> =
    \<AA>
subsubsection\<open>Empty digraph homomorphism is a faithful digraph homomorphism\<close>

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. dghm_0 \<AA> :
    dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<AA>
 2. \<And>a b.
       \<lbrakk>a \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>;
        b \<in>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> v11 (dghm_0
                               \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr> \<restriction>\<^sup>l\<^sub>\<circ>
                              Hom dg_0 a b)

proof (state)
goal (13 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (dghm_0 \<AA>)
 3. digraph \<alpha> dg_0
 4. digraph \<alpha> \<AA>
 5. vcard (dghm_0 \<AA>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 6. dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomDom\<rparr> = dg_0
 7. dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>HomCod\<rparr> = \<AA>
 8. vsv (dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr>)
 9. vsv (dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ArrMap\<rparr>)
 10. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dghm_0 \<AA>\<lparr>ObjMap\<rparr>) =
     dg_0\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
A total of 13 subgoals...

proof (state)
this:

  dg_0 \<mapsto>\<mapsto>\<^sub>D\<^sub>G\<^bsub>\<alpha>\<^esub> \<AA>

goal (1 subgoal):

subsection\<open>\<open>10\<close>: digraph with one object and no arrows\<close>

lemma dg_10_components:
  shows "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = set {\<aa>}"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = 0"
    and "dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> = ZFC_in_HOL.set {\<aa>} &&&
     dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>) &&&
    dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ> &&&
    dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr> = []\<^sub>\<circ>

proof (state)
goal (11 subgoals):
 1. \<Z> \<alpha>
 2. vfsequence (dg_10 \<aa>)
 3. vsv (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
 4. vsv (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
 5. vcard (dg_10 \<aa>) = 4\<^sub>\<nat>
 6. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>) =
    dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 7. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Dom\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 8. \<D>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>) =
    dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Arr\<rparr>
 9. \<R>\<^sub>\<circ> (dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Cod\<rparr>)
    \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr>
 10. dg_10 \<aa>\<lparr>Obj\<rparr> \<subseteq>\<^sub>\<circ> Vset \<alpha>
